title: Nerd Week: Steve Palazzolo analyzes Josh Allen, Derek Carr and the Rams (Football 8/20)
description:
Steve Palazzolo of PFF chats with Will Brinson on all things analytics. Steve explains how PFF works with all 32 teams in the NFL (4:30), before examining how and why the numbers don't favor Josh Allen (17:00). The Rams didn't live up to the hype last season coming off a Super Bowl appearance, but over we overlooking them too much heading into this year (28:30)? The guys discuss the value of tight ends, acknowledging the massive deals George Kittle and Travis Kelce just received, but wondering if they are still underpaid (34:00)...Guess what? The Carr family has blocked Steve, just like they blocked Brinson (38:00)! This episode is wrapped with a brief focus on Tua Tagovailoa and Dwayne Haskins.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @PFF_Steve
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
